title: Suspension without cause.
body:
Greetings,

So today I was automatically logged out after a game of solo queue and shown a pop up box containing the following:

_"PLAYER BANNED
This account has been suspended until 23 October 2017. Please visit support.leagueoflegends.com for more information."_

So to my initial confusion I tried to log in thinking well maybe I acted negative towards someone and received a suspension due to the in game chat logs. I tried to log in and couldn't do so, I was simply shown the same pop up message as before. Even more confused than before I thought hmm maybe I have an email from Riot. Alas I did have an email, though... it said this:

_"Greetings deadlyecho,

Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can review these terms at *link*

Due to the severity of this violation your League of Legends account has been banned until Mon Oct 23 00:00:00 UTC 2017

If you have any question, contact our Player Support team at *link*

Riot Games Player Support"_

Now I have 2 different points of contact from Riot both with no information whatsoever. I have submitted a ticket to see what's going on but what I'm curious about are things such as:

- Has anyone else been through something similar?
- Why is there no "reason" or given evidence.
- Why send me an email saying I've violated the LoL ToU but not say what the violation is?
- Do I now lose out on rewards? 
- Is it possible to have this suspension lifted?
- What possible causes are there to warrant a suspension in this manner?

I played 2 games today, both with 0 toxicity, 0 flame, 0 negativity, 0 salt. 1 4v5 flex game that we won and 1 solo queue game where I had another awesome team and we won... haven't played in 2 or 3 days and suddenly i'm suspended :3

Thank for reading

replies.body:
We've been working on a system that involves looking through champ select and post-game chats looking for instances of verbal abuse or unsportsmanlike behaviour.

We've been trialing this system during the last week. At the point at which I posted this comment, it looks like everyone who posted in this thread was punished by this system.

Because this is a relatively new system that is being trialed - there's currently no specific information in the client or in the email that you receive after being punished. If you contact Player Support, they will provide you with more context around why you were punished. We're planning on improving the info provided at the time of punishment over time. 

I'm happy to provide logs here from your own cases if you are willing for me to do so. Otherwise, Player Support should be able to help you out.
can you provide my logs pls, also been banned till the 23rd of October.

This kind of behaviour is clearly not appropriate. Offensive language has been edited for this log.

xD I bet Riot Zaps had a blast posting them. As soon as he asked for it on the thread, Zaps was probably like "well... ok if you say so...' lol

I think sending him via private message is more appropriate than to make everyone else know what he said(do we have the tech to send it?). I mean yeah he did something bad, but I think it is moral to not reveal other's mistake.

EDIT: Saw your other posts but it looks like you ask first, my bad for not reading.

Riot generally only supplies logs on boards if someone asks or gives permission for them to be shown :) Otherwise as you say, it's a privacy thing and they'd point them to player support to get their logs.
And thank god, or else these threads wouldn't be worth clicking on.

The guy has an SKT T1 icon and is being racist to Asians. I just cannot fathom the amount of ignorance and hatred people have... for what?

They were not asian, they banned my champion that I selected then spammed google translate stuff and then trolled my game. I'm pretty sure I demoted that day because of multiple trolls, including this game. If that was you, I'm sure that you will react to the situation a similar way as well mate.
lol. no. i'd either dodge or mute all and suck it up. you have no emotional maturity.
I'm with this guy.  No amount of trolling would make me say those things.
Equating a single Asian race (Korean) to all Asian races is rather ignorant and racist too btw.

He didn't. 
His comment was targeted towards all Asians, so its appropriate to use any as an example. 
lol
Lets watch this unfold. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Woah, this game. Those guys weren't even asian (They told us in game)...They trolled by banning our champs that we selected as not to be ban. Then they spammed chat with Chinese using google translate. Later in game, they were refusing to work with the team and threw away a free win. Yasou and Ashe I think it was, these 2 literally triggered us on purpose. Please take a look at this game, if I'm banned and they are not, then this is rigged.

Chances are, it was more your reaction to the situation that lost that game. The fact you have the audacity to try and justify your actions after your logs were publicly published is beyond me. Are you seriously incapable of dodging; or at the very least, ignoring them and reporting them after the game? How can you be mad about losing a game that you clearly had no intentions of winning. Had you any actual regard for the game, your team and your rank, you would have remained silent and reported them after the game. Got everything you deserved imo, gg Riot.
Will i be missing out on any rewards?

[This is the official document on who receives end of season rewards. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility)Anyone who was banned after 8/22/2017 for more than 7 days will not receive rewards.

I actually want to know what I got banned for that was soo serious? I didn't get a warning for behavior or anything. I'm fairly passive a lot of the times and rarely talk unless playing with friends and that's over discord. I find it very off to reviece a 3 week ban, losing honor and rewards with no warning. I've been playing league for years and have never gotten a ban like this. I spend time every year just to get to atleast gold 5 to receive rewards. Like if it was something small and I got a 3 day ban as a warning that's fair. But 3 weeks and losing out of things I play this game for? Ok.

I did make a ticket a few days ago asking about it
